sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PURCHS (PURCHS_SN, PURCHS_DE, TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT, REAL_SETLE_AMOUNT, USE_POINT , CRTFC_NO, SETLE_DT, SETLE_IP, ESNTL_ID, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, DELETE_AT) VALUES (#purchs_sn#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #tot_setle_amount#, #real_setle_amount#, #use_point# , #crtfc_no#, SYSDATE, #setle_ip#, #esntl_id#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE ,'N')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_CART_GOODS SET PURCHS_AT = 'Y' WHERE CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT PURCHS_SN, PURCHS_DE, TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT, REAL_SETLE_AMOUNT, USE_POINT , CRTFC_NO, SETLE_DT, SETLE_IP, ESNTL_ID, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT FROM TB_PURCHS P WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN FROM TB_PURCHS_GOODS P WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn#
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN WHERE P.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#

SELECT G.FILE_CODE, P.PURCHS_SN, P.PURCHS_DE, P.TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT, CG.CART_SN, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE , CG.TOUR_DE, CG.CHKIN_DE, CG.CHCKT_DE, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.END_TIME, G.CL_SE FROM ( SELECT A.PURCHS_SN, A.CART_SN, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT P.PURCHS_SN, CG.CART_SN FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN WHERE P.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
ORDER BY P.PURCHS_SN DESC, CG.CART_SN ) A ) B INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS P ON B.PURCHS_SN = P.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON B.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON CG.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startIdx# AND #endIdx# ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT P.REAL_SETLE_AMOUNT, P.PURCHS_DE FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN WHERE P.PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND PG.CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PURCHS_REVIEW (PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, REVIEW_CN, REVIEW_SCORE, ESNTL_ID, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT) VALUES ( #purchs_sn#, #cart_sn#, #goods_code#, #review_cn#, #review_score#, #esntl_id#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.select: SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, REVIEW_CN, REVIEW_SCORE, ESNTL_ID, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT FROM TB_PURCHS_REVIEW WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS_REVIEW SET REVIEW_CN = #review_cn#, REVIEW_SCORE = #review_score#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, POINT, ACCML_SE, ACCML_DT, VALID_DE, ESNTL_ID FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PURCHS_POINT (PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, POINT, ACCML_SE, ACCML_DT, VALID_DE, ESNTL_ID) VALUES ( #purchs_sn#, #cart_sn#, #point#, #accml_se#, SYSDATE, #valid_de#, #esntl_id#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', DELETE_ID = #esntl_id#, DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
